messages.content: Give me and my candidate your vote on Thursday 8th June and I will: Provide strong and stable leadership for our country, Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future, Always stand up for you and your family. Don't risk our future at this crucial moment in history with a vote for anyone else.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Andrew wants to leave the EU and is committed to making a success of Brexit.

mentions.candidate: Andrew was born in Pontefract and has worked and lived in Yorkshire all his life.

issues.brexitEurope: Andrew wants to leave the EU and is committed to making a success of Brexit.
issues.economy: Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future.
issues.government: Provide strong and stable leadership for our country.

community.content: He will deliver a better deal for the people of Normanton, Pontefract, and Castleford.

endorsements.endorsement: Back me on Thursday 8th June to lead Britain.
